summary: This mod adds 26 new weapons to the forge list.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Dual Sheath Redux[/color] compatibility patches pack byÂ dptheslothking:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647/?]LINK[/url]

***

[color=#ffff00]Ordinary weapons for Skyrim[/color] v1.0 Eng/Ger/Rus

[color=#ffff00]Authors[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures
Thorwulf65 - German translation

***

This mod adds 26 new weapons to the forge list. All weapons are divided into different categories depended on various Smithing perks.

***

Changes in version 1.0:
- New weapons added
- Weapons added to the leveled-lists and can be obtained with other methods than forging :)

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY ONE ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***

[color=#ffff00]
